Package pacman_ultimater.project_base.core

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman_ultimater.project_base.core.Tile
  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides resources for saving text symbols as tiles and easier further manipulation. Also contains useful function for converting selected keywords to tiles.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Tile.nType
      Enumerable for possible tile states.

        Tile​(java.lang.String tile)

    • Method Detail

      • DrawTile

        public void DrawTile​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                     java.awt.Point location,
                     java.awt.Color color)
        Function for drawing tile states as their curve representation.
        Parameters:
        g - Current graphics handler.
        location - Tile's top left corner.
        color - Desired color of tile's curve representation.

      • FreeTile

        public void FreeTile​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                     java.awt.Point location,
                     java.awt.Color bkgColor)
        Visually frees tile by drawing rectangle over it, with the color of background.
        Parameters:
        g - Current graphics handler.
        location - Tile's top left corner.
        bkgColor - Color of map's background.
